mapper.select: SELECT bd_seq, mb_id, bd_title, bd_content, bd_create_at, bd_update_at, files, comment FROM springsns.board order by bd_update_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO springsns.board ( mb_id, bd_title, bd_content ) VALUES ( #{mbId}, #{bdTitle}, #{bdContent} )

INSERT INTO springsns.files ( bd_seq, mb_id, up_original_file_name, up_new_file_name, up_file_path, up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{bdSeq}, #{mbId}, #{upOriginalFileName}, #{upNewFileName}, #{upFilePath}, #{upFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE springsns.board SET bd_seq=#{bdSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, bd_title=#{bdTitle}, bd_content=#{bdContent}, bd_update_at=now() WHERE bd_seq=#{bdSeq}

UPDATE springsns.files SET bd_seq=#{bdSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, up_original_file_name=#{upOriginalFileName}, up_new_file_name=#{upNewFileName}, up_file_path=#{upFilePath}, up_file_size=#{upFileSize} WHERE bd_seq=#{bdSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT bd_seq, mb_id, bd_title, bd_content, bd_create_at, bd_update_at, files, comment FROM springsns.board where bd_seq = #{bdSeq}
